label: Upload_Recipe
info:
**Description**: Endpoint where users can upload recipes in BPMN format.
**Functionality**: Perfoms the following actions:
Reads name of process from BPMN document (process id or name)
Inserts in DB a new process using name and whole BPMN document

label: Analyse_Task
info: This flow analyse tasks and progress on the process depending on the conditions

label: Update_Process
info:
This flow checks if the active tasks should progress from Ready_to_Start to another state.
It also checks if finished processes merge with another branch of the process in a parallelGateway. Enables the process to progress if all of them have finihed.

name: GetInput
Validate context for re-selection of a service.
info:
Input:
    JSON object as request body. User should provide the intended service to validate and some quality of service (QoS) parameters as input.

Output: 
    JSON object representing the validation result. 
    The response indicates whether the requested service accomplish all quality parameters, a boolean "true" is returned, otherwise "false" and a new "suggestedService" object are returned. 
    The "suggestService" object is the service that full fills all the QoS conditions sent in the request. 
    This object contains all properties of a service including: url, method, name, identifier, inputs, outputs, etc.

name: Goto: InParallelGateway
info:
Links to the parallelGateway subflow
We are not considering that a parallelGateway can happen after another parallelgateway. If this process is possible we should consider this situation for merging purposes

name: PrepareInsertNewReadyToStartTask
GetSequenceFlowsForCurrentTask
Find next task to be processed within the selected sequenceFlow
info:
1) Searchs for the next task to be processed within the selected sequenceFlow
2) Evaluate if nextTask is parallelGateway, if so, apply join to avoid duplicates
3) Goto: InInsertNewReadyToStartTask

name: Goto: InStartEvent
info: In this case, just have to read connected sequence flow and move to the next task

name: SetDebugMessage
Set current task status to: Finished_Treated
info:
1) Update current task to Finished_Treated
2) If it's an EndEvent task: Terminate the whole process, otherwise
3) Treat Ready_To_Start tasks

name: PrepareUpdateTaskFinishedTreated
ExclusiveGateway: Evaluate which sequenceFlow should be executed
info:
1) Get sequenceFlows linked to the current exclusiveGateway
2) These sequenceFlows should have conditionExpressions, loop through them
3) Evaluate each conditionExpression. Select the sequenceFlow that gets true as eval result
4) Call subflow InMoveFromCurrentActiveTaskToNext

name: EvaluateWhichSequenceFlowShallBeExecuted
Get all sequenceFlows of current task
info:
1) Search all sequenceFlows of current active task.
2) Loop through them

name: SetDebugMessage
func:
msg.debugMessage = "Error, tasks of type «" + msg.activeTask.type + "» are not supported yet. This task will be skipped."
return msg;

name: FindNextTaskWithinTheSequenceFlow
ParallelGateway: Wait for termination of previous tasks
EndEvent
info:
1) Update current task to Finished_Treated
2) Terminate the whole process

name: StartEvent
info:
1) Update current task to Finished_Treated
2) Get next senquenceFlows

name: Insert new Ready_To_Start Task
info:
1) Insert a new task under the status Ready_To_Start
2) Join because many Ready_To_Start tasks can be inserted
2) Goto: InTreatReadyToStartTasks

name: GetMessageEventDefinition
Perform REST service invocation
info:
1) Gets service properties: URL, method, async, input, and output parameters
2) Sends http request
3) Stores service response

Async services:
1) If the service is async, invoke endpoint and dont wait, just go to the next task without changing its status to finished.
2) For the callback, set serviceResponse variable and update status to finished

name: GetServiceTaskExtensionElements
SetServiceResponse
If IsAsync, invoke service and continue with next task at the same time
prepareServiceContextValidation
PrepareSelectReadyToStartTasks

info: Subflow that deals with active tasks Ready_To_Start and progress in the execution of the process instance

name: PrepareUpdate
FinishProcessInstance
info: updates status to a process instance to Finished

name: SetDebugMessage
func:
msg.debugMessage = "Process «" + msg.activeTask.instance_id + "» has finished its execution!"
return msg;

name: PrepareSelectProcessInstances
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT " +
            " p.name " +
            ",pi.id " +
            ",pi.status " +
            "FROM process_instance pi " + 
            "INNER JOIN process p " +
            "ON p.id = pi.process_id " +
            "WHERE pi.status = 'In_Progress';";
return msg;

name: PrepareSelectActiveTasks
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT " +
            " instance_id " +
            ",bpmn_id " +
            ",status "+
            ",type " +
            "FROM active_task " +
            "WHERE status != 'Finished_Treated' " +
            "ORDER BY instance_id;";
return msg;

name: PrepareSelectProcesses
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT " +
            " name " +
            ",implementationKind " +
            "FROM process;"
return msg;

name: BuildInsertActiveTask
Finish Call Service
Next Task Upload
info:
Includes in DB the next task. If the actual task is a parallelGateway does not go forward.
It needs to check if all the branches have finished (merge) to progress. This is done in Update_Process

name: Finish Service
info: Finishes the serviceTask. It finishes with a flag Finished and not Finished_Treated. This is to assure correct merging of branches in the process. This is done in Update_Process

name: From Call Service (Sync)
info: This is to process syncrhonous service calls

name: Collect Responses from Service (Async)
info: This is to process asyncrhonous responses
